forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 11am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 61. West wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 47. West wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As dawn greets Boston, the city is shrouded in a tapestry of soft gray clouds, the air heavy with promise yet uncertain. With the day still young, the forecast whispers of impending rain—an invitation to wander beneath an overcast sky, perhaps in search of the last traces of spring. A gentle, westerly breeze stirs, carrying with it the scent of moist earth and the hint of renewal. Though temperatures hover pleasantly around the low sixties, one might opt for a light jacket, particularly if venturing out later when evening draws near and the temperature dips toward a cool 47 degrees. 

Today seems to beckon those with a penchant for quiet exploration—strolling along the esplanade or indulging in a cozy café where the light rain taps softly against the windows. A bit of rain might grace your shoulders, but the atmosphere is ripe for intimacy, whether alone with a book or sharing moments over a cup of coffee with a friend. As the day unfolds, keep an eye on the clouds and choose wisely your adventures; the city holds its breath in anticipation, promising discovery within its tucked-away corners.
